A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was slow\, and was not engaging. Felt like the writer/director didn’t know how to proceed with the film and made things up along the way. This is the worst Star Wars movie of the franchise. Felt as if he just wanted to throw away the characters. His idea seemed to care more for his new characters\, and forget about the characters from past movies. It appears the writer did not have any affection towards characters previously established\, as he just washed them away
